abilities.title: Flank 'Em!
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose an allied Clone Trooper Unit. Each character in the chosen Unit may . Run and Gun Each character in this Unit may . If any characters , this Unit immediately makes a focus action. Pack Hunter When a character in this Unit makes a attack targeting an enemy character that is Engaged with another allied Clone Trooper character, it adds 2 dice to the attack roll. Wolfpack While this Unit is not Wounded, when an allied Clone Trooper character makes an attack targeting an enemy character within 5 of another allied Clone Trooper Unit, the attacker's [crit] results cannot be modified by enemy effects.
